title: How to Fix a Frozen Xbox 360

steps.headline: Highlight your hard drive and press y.
Press y click into clear system cache.
Try to recreate the problem.
steps.description: If it doesn't freeze it's fixed.

steps.headline: Shut down your Xbox  and take the hard drive out, if it freezes again.
Repeat step five.
steps.description: If you can't recreate problem, then it is solved.

steps.headline: Go to the website and have it fixed by following the steps.
steps.description: Use the points below to check if it is a hard drive or console problem. If it does freeze your Xbox needs to be sent in to be fixed. if it doesn't freeze your hard drive needs to be sent in to be repaired.

text: Turn on your Xbox . Use the 'power' button. Go to your Xbox memory. Use the controller. Highlight your hard drive and press y. Do not enter it yet. Press y click into clear system cache. Continue to clear it. Try to recreate the problem. If it doesn't freeze it's fixed. Shut down your Xbox  and take the hard drive out, if it freezes again. Again use the 'power' button. Repeat step five. If you can't recreate problem, then it is solved. Go to the website and have it fixed by following the steps. Use the points below to check if it is a hard drive or console problem. If it does freeze your Xbox needs to be sent in to be fixed. if it doesn't freeze your hard drive needs to be sent in to be repaired.
